title: Allow common js, css, and font libraries to be *installed*
body: The web abounds with popular js and css libraries that are constantly downloaded and sometimes cached by the browser. My suggestion is that MS extend the caching concept to make these libraries installable, in a manner similar to a plugin or extension.

comments.body: The whole idea of them being NOT installed is that the webmaster tests his site, with his own versions of the dependencies, and makes sure that works.
